actions.text: On agreeing to the Durbin amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides $1.5 million to the EPA for the Toxic Release Inventory program.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 12 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996, to increase the funds appropriated in the bill for EPA Environmental Programs by $1.5 million and to reduce funds appropriated for EPA Science and Technology programs commensurately.
